description:
If a law enforcement or corrections officer has violated your civil rights and you feel like no one cares, think again. The Bagley Firm, P.C., located in the Bronx, New York, absolutely cares about your rights, and our law firm's attorney, Nicholas Bagley, stands ready, willing and able to aggressively represent you.

We have deep experience litigating the following types of civil rights cases:

  • Police brutality and excessive force
  • False arrests, malicious prosecutions, false imprisonments
  • False accusations
  • Unreasonable searches and seizures
  • Illegal stops and stop-and-frisks

In addition, The Bagley Firm, P.C., can advise, counsel and represent you in the following areas:

  • Personal injury: Motor vehicle accidents, bicycle accidents, pedestrian accidents, construction accidents, workers' compensation claims, slips and falls, dog bites, wrongful death of your loved one
  • Medical malpractice and negligence: Failure to diagnose, misdiagnosis, failure to properly and timely treat, prescription drug errors, surgical errors, failure to follow standard procedures
  • Commercial and civil litigation: Administrative claims against New York agencies, contract disputes

Since 2012, our law firm has provided small-firm personal attention with big-firm experience to clients throughout New York City and the surrounding areas.

Our law firm offers free initial consultations and virtual appointments to protect your health and give you peace of mind.
